recommended_action:
1. Go to Kubernetes GCP Console by visiting
https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/list?
2. Select reported Kubernetes clusters for which Automatic node upgrades is disabled
3. Click on EDIT button and Set Automatic node upgrades to Enabled
rationale: Node pools with auto-upgrades enabled are automatically scheduled for upgrades when a new stable Kubernetes version becomes available. When the upgrade is performed, the node pool is upgraded to match the current cluster master version.

autoUpgrade.errorMessage: Kubernetes cluster does not have automatic node updgrade enabled.
